snippet: The world’s largest maker of smartphones said it would increase its cash returns to shareholders and shift from hardware to software.
abstract: Samsung Electronics says it will double its dividend to shareholders in effort to lift its stock price, which has lagged behind those of competitors; says it will shift from hardware to software.
lead_paragraph: The world’s largest maker of smartphones said it would increase its cash returns to shareholders and shift from hardware to software.

headline.main: Samsung to Double Dividend in Bid to Lift Its Stock Price
headline.print_headline: Samsung to Double Dividend In Bid to Lift Its Stock Price
